techmeme.title: Source: Anthropic could launch a "voice mode" feature for Claude as soon as this month, which will initially roll out on a limited basis (Bloomberg)
Anthropic says Claude now integrates with Google Workspace for access to Gmail, Calendar, and Google Docs, coming first to Max, Team, Enterprise, and Pro plans (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Google rolls out its text-to-video AI model Veo 2 to Gemini Advanced subscribers and makes its Whisk Animate tool available for Google One AI Premium users (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Mark Zuckerberg's $1B Instagram and $19B WhatsApp deals, central to the FTC's antitrust case, were mocked at the time, and the trial hinges on hypotheticals (Mike Isaac/New York Times)
FTC v. Meta: Mark Zuckerberg testified about his acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp, including a 2012 email exchange rationalizing the apps' acquisition (Bloomberg)
